subject: Attn,
body:
Attn,
This is to officially inform you that Mr Zodik Mohammed and Mr Rasheed
Abdul visited my office this Morning with a Sworn Affedavit requesting
for a change of an account that belong to you and divert your total
amount $2.5M to another account.
Now we want to confirm from you if you authorize such changes hence we
want to hear from you before embark on the change of account as
directed by the two Men because we are not comfortable to divert your
fund to another account without your permission.
This letter does not mean to cause any embarrassment but diligent and
 due process must be adhered to avoid any form of litigation. contact for more details and information ( 
jt8172519@gmail.com
 )
Regards,
 
Mr John Terry.
(Director.Legal Department United Community Bank)

subject: Re: Attn,
body:
Dear Mr. John Terry,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the visit from Mr. Zodik Mohammed and Mr. Rasheed Abdul. I appreciate your diligence in confirming the authorization of any changes to my account.

Could you please provide me with more information about the purpose of their visit? What specific changes are they requesting? It is important for me to understand the details before making any decisions.

Additionally, could you clarify why they would want to divert my funds to another account? Is there a valid reason for this request?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon so that we can proceed accordingly.

Best wishes,
Justin
